name: Progressive flight
description:
You play as a bird that flies in the sky. The objective of the game is to knock down all the pins on the level.

Control:

A - turn left 

D - right

W - tilt down

 S - up

Space - flap the wings to get higher (the flap has a CD equal to its animation)

If you did not hit all the pins, just press SPACE and try to finish what you started.

In the upper left corner you will find a restart button if you want to try leveling first to improve your result

Only 2 levels, unfortunately I could not use three days to the full

Thank you all for your attention to my game and have a great day!
